title: Rent Amortization and Follow-Up System
description: A web application to manage rent amortization schedules and follow-up processes, automating key workflows for efficiency and accuracy.

title: WSO2 API Integration & Awash Birr Pro Mobile App
description: Integrated external APIs using WSO2 API Manager and developed a mobile banking app for Awash Birr Pro to access banking services and transaction histories.

title: Daily Exchange Rate System
description: A Laravel PHP-based system to manage daily forex rates, providing real-time updates, historical access, and role-based validations for accuracy.

title: Vendor Management System
description: A dynamic system using Spring Boot and AngularJS to manage vendors, automate approvals, track performance, and integrate payments for operational efficiency.

title: Material Management System
description: ASP.NET MVC-based system to manage material requisitions, approvals, inventory, and payment workflows with dynamic reporting features.

title: Driver Management System
description: A responsive React app with Material React Table (MRT) for managing driver data. Features include sorting, a config-driven filter panel, CSV/Excel/PDF/JSON exports, i18n support, and seamless integration with a Node.js API or mock data.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A fully responsive portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and work experience. Designed in Figma and implemented with ReactJS and Vue for interactive UI components.
